data.comment: Today's referee, Nobutsugu Murakami, has blown to start the match.
Hiroshima to take a throw-in in Shimizu territory.
In the minute 3, Shimizu's Carlinhos Junior misses with an attempt on goal.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards Hiroshima a goal kick.
In Hiroshima, Yusuke Chajima of Hiroshima is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 6, Nobutsugu Murakami signals a throw-in for Hiroshima, close to Shimizu's area.
Shimizu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Hiroshima in the half of Shimizu.
In the minute 11, Hiroshima are coming forward and Akira Ibayashi gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Shimizu's half.
In the minute 13, Can Hiroshima capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Shimizu's half?
Goal kick for Shimizu at EDION Stadium.
Throw-in for Shimizu close to the penalty box.
In the minute 16, Free kick Shimizu.
Hiroshima are pushing forward but Douglas Vieira's finish is wide of the goal.
Shimizu have a goal kick.
In the minute 19, It's a goal kick for the home team in Hiroshima.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 21, At EDION Stadium, Shimizu are penalized for being offside.
Goal kick for Shimizu at EDION Stadium.
Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Hiroshima.
In the minute 23, Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Shimizu.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in their own half.
Can Hiroshima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
In the minute 27, Ball safe as Shimizu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Hiroshima have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 28, Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
Shimizu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 30, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Ezequiel.
Throw-in Hiroshima.
In the minute 33, Hayato Araki is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Carlinhos Junior (Shimizu) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Hiroshima defenders.
In the minute 35, Hiroshima's Hayato Araki is back in action after a slight knock.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Hiroshima in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Shimizu in Hiroshima.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Hiroshima at EDION Stadium.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards Hiroshima a goal kick.
Ezequiel (Hiroshima) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Hiroshima in the half of Shimizu.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Shimizu apply pressure and a brilliant heading opportunity is created for Junior Dutra but the ball hits the post!
In the minute 44, Hiroshima have a goal kick.
In Hiroshima a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Hiroshima's Douglas Vieira gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Hiroshima's Yusuke Chajima breaks free at EDION Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Hiroshima.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
Throw-in Shimizu.
In the minute 47, Nobutsugu Murakami awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
Throw-in for Shimizu at EDION Stadium.
In the minute 50, Renato Augusto gets his shot on target but fails to score for Shimizu.
Shimizu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Shimizu awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 55, Nobutsugu Murakami signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Shimizu's half.
Shimizu needs to be cautious. Hiroshima have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Shimizu in their own half.
In the minute 58, Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Shimizu in their own half.
Toshihiro Aoyama is replacing Hayao Kawabe for Hiroshima at EDION Stadium.
In the minute 59, Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
Hiroshi Jofuku (Hiroshima) is making a second substitution, with Tsukasa Morishima replacing Ezequiel.
In the minute 60, Hiroshima's Yuya Asano is on target but unsuccessful.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a throw-in for Hiroshima, close to Shimizu's area.
Shimizu make their first substitution with Shota Kaneko replacing Junior Dutra.
Peter Cklamovski is making the team's second substitution at EDION Stadium with Keita Nakamura replacing Kenta Nishizawa.
Throw-in for Hiroshima close to the penalty box.
In the minute 61, Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
Throw-in high up the field for Hiroshima in Hiroshima.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Hiroshima.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Shimizu in the half of Hiroshima.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in their own half.
Ball safe as Hiroshima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 66, Can Shimizu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hiroshima's half?
Carlinhos Junior of Shimizu gets in a strike, but is off target.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards Hiroshima a goal kick.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Shimizu in their own half.
Yoshifumi Kashiwa is replacing Yuya Asano for the home team.
The home team have replaced Kosei Shibasaki with Rhayner. This is the fourth substitution made today by Hiroshi Jofuku.
In the minute 69, Can Hiroshima capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Shimizu's half?
Toshihiro Aoyama for Hiroshima gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
In the minute 71, Hiroshima to take a throw-in in Shimizu territory.
Goal! Douglas Vieira extends Hiroshima's lead to 2-0.
That's a fine assist from Keisuke Osako.
In the minute 72, Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Shimizu at EDION Stadium.
Ball safe as Hiroshima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 75, Yosuke Kawai is on a sub for Ryo Takeuchi for Shimizu.
Yuito Suzuki is replacing Kota Miyamoto for the away team.
The home team replace Douglas Vieira with Leandro Pereira.
In the minute 78, Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Hiroshima in their own half.
Important block from the Shimizu defence as Rhayner fires in a strike for Hiroshima.
In the minute 79, Hiroshima have a dangerous throw-in.
Goal! Hiroshima extend their lead to 3-0 through Leandro Pereira.
Rhayner instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 84, Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
In Hiroshima a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Leandro Pereira (Hiroshima) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 86, Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
In the minute 88, Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
Hiroshima take a comfortable 4-0 lead thanks to Yoshifumi Kashiwa.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nobutsugu Murakami will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick in a good position for Shimizu!
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Keita Nakamura of Shimizu gets in a strike, but is off target.
Hiroshima have a goal kick.
Nobutsugu Murakami blows to end the match. The final score is 4-1.
Goal! The away team reduce the deficit to 4-1 through a header from Carlinhos Junior.
